department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Art and Architecture

course.title: Image of the Black in Western Art
course.faculty_text: Suzanne P. Blier and David Bindman
course.description: This seminar will critically examine the depiction and contextualization of individuals of African descent in European and American art. Among the various issues raised are historic changes in the idea of and construction of race, the impact of early internationalism, notions of difference in the age of exploration, slavery and notions of selfhood, and representation as part of the larger colonial project.
